title: Willy Ley - Essays on Astronomy

The torrent contains (God willing) the below listed essays and snippets (essays [15-50 kb, some did span several issues but there were also some doubleheaders], snippets [3-10 kb], mainly from Q&A sessions. Orphaned pieces were given titles). Format, all htm. Embedded illustrations, 'particle board' cleaned (50ties paper quality), png and jpg. Some substitutions of  low quality illustrations (historic frontispieces). A number of intro pictures were added (NASA, Bonestells, magazine covers). Link/credit if known, of interest. Note files, self explanatory.

Source: GALAXY and other magazines, period 30ties (some rough reading), 40ties, 50ties, 60ties, in particular the GALAXY facsimile torrent (80%).

Version 2014-03. Hopefully no more pruning and trimming. An older version was uploaded to bookOS.org [the name changes] (Ley, essays.rar). I would like to see it replaced.

Not included in this slew, Ley's zoological and cryptozoological essays and his forays into chemistry (comparable to the 4 element series by Asimov). A few of Ley's essays are hard to classify (history of smoking, forgeries [the Dvur KrÃƒÂ¡lovÃƒÂ© manuscript], puzzles).
